property.name: DefenderBriefing
property.value:
An enemy commander has initiated a FACTORY ASSAULT operation, a high-stakes battle to conquer a valuable factory planet that you are defending!

This will be a challenging defense, and BOTH sides will have significant artillery they can call in from beyond the battlefield. Use your artillery to keep the enemy moving and off-balance... and also be aware your opponent will be trying to do the same to you!!!

Success in this operation may very well determine the course of this war, so fight hard and good luck!

OPERATION FEATURES:
* Opposing Sides: Deployment will always be opposite of opponent (0% chance of center/edge)
* Attacker Artillery: 1 or more artillery units (number and type depends on BV), deployed off-board
* Defender Artillery: 1 or more artillery units (number and type depends on BV), deployed off-board

VICTORY CONDITIONS (All-Out Battle):
* Force opponent to surrender OR trigger auto-victory
* Auto-victory triggered when 1) 60% of enemy BV destroyed, and 2) friendly BV is 150% of enemy BV

BATTLE OUTCOMES:
* Land Exchange (HIGH): 2000 BV: ~28 CP / 4000 BV: ~36 CP / 6000 BV: ~44 CP
* Intelligence (Standard Defender): +1 Intel
* Influence (HIGH): 2000 BV: ~60 flu / 4000 BV: ~100 flu / 6000 BV: ~140 flu
* Operation Pay (HIGH): 2000 BV: ~4,352 CBills / 4000 BV: ~7,552 CBills / 6000 BV: ~10,752 CBills
* Loss Penalty: -20% if defeated -- standard loss penalty
* Dishonorable Surrender: ADDITIONAL -20% pay if you surrender before a 20% BV loss
* Salvage (Favorable to Winner): 60% friendly/60% enemy -- winner will have firm control of battlefield

***END BRIEFING***

property.name: AttackerBriefing
property.value:
You have launched a FACTORY ASSAULT operation, a high-stakes battle to conquer a valuable factory planet!

This will be a challenging frontal attack, and BOTH sides will have significant artillery they can call in from beyond the battlefield. Use your artillery to keep the enemy moving and off-balance... and also be aware your opponent will be trying to do the same to you!!!

Success in this operation may very well determine the course of this war, so fight hard and good luck!

OPERATION FEATURES:
* Opposing Sides: Deployment will always be opposite of opponent (0% chance of center/edge)
* Attacker Artillery: 1 or more artillery units (number and type depends on BV), deployed off-board
* Defender Artillery: 1 or more artillery units (number and type depends on BV), deployed off-board

VICTORY CONDITIONS (All-Out Battle):
* Force opponent to surrender OR trigger auto-victory
* Auto-victory triggered when 1) 60% of enemy BV destroyed, and 2) friendly BV is 150% of enemy BV

BATTLE OUTCOMES:
* Land Exchange (HIGH): 2000 BV: ~28 CP / 4000 BV: ~36 CP / 6000 BV: ~44 CP
* Intelligence (None): No Intel for attacker
* Influence (None): No influence for attacker
* Operation Pay (MEDIUM): 2000 BV: ~3,627 CBills / 4000 BV: ~6,293 CBills / 6000 BV: ~8,960 CBills
* Loss Penalty: -20% if defeated -- standard loss penalty
* Dishonorable Surrender: ADDITIONAL -20% pay if you surrender before a 20% BV loss
* Salvage (Favorable to Winner): 60% friendly/60% enemy -- winner will have firm control of battlefield

***END BRIEFING***
